site_name: UNIT 5 BULLSBRIDGE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE HAYES ROAD SOUTHALL   UB2 5LN
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to allow changes to the full height double glazed curtain walling with single height double glazed curtain walling with cladding to match existing, the removal of the approved mezzanine floor, extension of the entranceway southwards and the creation of a separate trolley bay (including the installation of metal roller shutters for the neighbouring unit of planning permission 00580/AI/P1 approved 04/06/2021 for the change of use from A1(non-food) retail to open A1 (including food) retail, subdivision of the existing unit to form two A1 retail units, car park reconfiguration, external alterations and associated works( Out of Bourough Consulation London Borough of Hounslow)
